tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MarketAnalysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(50),
    market_trend VARCHAR(100),
    trading_opportunity BOOLEAN,
    analysis_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE trading_opportunities (
    opportunity_id SERIAL,
    symbol VARCHAR(50),
    entry_price DECIMAL,
    exit_price DECIMAL,
    status VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE market_trends (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   trend_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   trend_description TEXT,
   trend_start_date DATE,
   trend_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE trading_opportunities (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   opportunity_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   opportunity_details TEXT,
   opportunity_type VARCHAR(50),
   opportunity_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE market_analysis (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   analysis_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   analysis_details TEXT,
   analysis_date DATE,
   analyst_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE market_statistics (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 symbol VARCHAR(255),
 market_cap DECIMAL(10,2),
 volume DECIMAL(10,2),
 timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ
);

CREATE TABLE trading_signals (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 symbol VARCHAR(255),
 buy_signal BOOLEAN,
 sell_signal BOOLEAN,
 timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ
);

CREATE TABLE technical_indicators (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 symbol VARCHAR(255),
 rsi DECIMAL(5,2),
 macd DECIMAL(5,2),
 timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ
);

CREATE TABLE trade_history (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 symbol VARCHAR(255),
 action VARCHAR(10),
 price DECIMAL(10,2),
 timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ
);

CREATE TABLE MarketTrends (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name VARCHAR(255),
    trend_description TEXT,
    trend_start_date DATE,
    trend_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE TradeHistory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trade_name VARCHAR(255),
    trade_description TEXT,
    trade_date DATE,
    trade_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
